name: Twist Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Twist Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Twist API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Twist API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: messageConversation
available_options: Channel (值: channel)
Comment (值: comment)
Message Conversation (值: messageConversation)
Thread (值: thread)
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Create (值: create) - Create a new thread in a channel
Delete (值: delete) - Delete a thread
Get (值: get) - Get information about a thread
Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many threads
Update (值: update) - Update a thread
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

workspaceId.name: workspaceId
workspaceId.description: The ID of the workspace. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
workspaceId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Workspace Name or ID | 作用: The ID of the workspace. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

name.name: name
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: The name of the channel | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: actionsUi (值: None)
binaryProperties (值: None) - Name of the property that holds the binary data. Multiple can be defined separated by comma.
direct_mentions (值: None) - The users that are directly mentioned. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
recipients (值: None) - The users that will attached to the thread. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
send_as_integration (值: None) - Whether to display the integration as the thread creator
temp_id (值: None) - The temporary ID of the thread

channelId.name: channelId
channelId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Channel ID | 作用: The ID of the channel | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: as_ids (值: None) - Whether only the IDs of the threads are returned
filter_by (值: None) - A filter can be one of `attached_to_me`, `everyone` and `is_starred`
newer_than_ts (值: None) - Limits threads to those newer when the specified Unix time
older_than_ts (值: None) - Limits threads to those older than the specified Unix time

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: actionsUi (值: None)
binaryProperties (值: None) - Name of the property that holds the binary data. Multiple can be defined separated by comma.
content (值: None) - The content of the thread
direct_mentions (值: None) - The users that are directly mentioned. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
title (值: None) - The title of the thread (1 < length < 300)

threadId.name: threadId
threadId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Thread ID | 作用: The ID of the thread | (必填项)

content.name: content
content.natural_language_description: 参数名: Content | 作用: The content of the thread | (必填项)

commentId.name: commentId
commentId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Comment ID | 作用: The ID of the comment | (必填项)

conversationId.name: conversationId
conversationId.description: The ID of the conversation. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
conversationId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Conversation Name or ID | 作用: The ID of the conversation. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

id.name: id
id.description: The ID of the conversation message
id.natural_language_description: 参数名: Conversation Message ID | 作用: The ID of the conversation message | (必填项)

title.name: title
title.description: The title of the new thread (1 < length < 300)
title.natural_language_description: 参数名: Title | 作用: The title of the new thread (1 < length < 300) | (必填项)
